NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Publishing and Attendance or the cell corresponding to Football and Ratings?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Football} and {Ratings} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Publishing and Royalties or the cell corresponding to Gaming and Sponsorship?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Movies and Ratings or the cell corresponding to Basketball and Viewership?

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.60 to 0.74?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Publishing, Merchandise), (Movies, Ratings), (Music, Ratings), (Publishing, Ratings), (Theater, Ratings), (Gaming, Royalties), (Movies, Royalties), (Music, Royalties), (Football, Sponsorship), (Gaming, Sponsorship), (Football, Viewership), (Gaming, Viewership)}.
